Class Point

java.lang.Object
Point
public class Point extends Object
Defines a class, named Point, to represent a point on the Cartesian plane, making use of the point's x and y coordinates, both of type double.
Version:
v0.0
Author:
Kailyn Lau + CS230 Staff (SK)

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Point()
    It creates a Point at location (0.0, 0.0).
    Point(double xCoord, double yCoord)
    Given two doubles, it creates a Point.

      public double findDistance(Point other)
      Finds and returns the distance between this (the invoking) point and the input one.
      Parameters:
      other - The other point
      Returns:
      The distance between this point and the inputted one

    • areEquidistant

      public boolean areEquidistant(Point p2, Point p3)
      Checkes whether this point is at equal distance from the two inputted points. Returns true if the two points are practically equidistant, i.e. their distance is less than TOLERANCE, false otherwise.
      Parameters:
      p2 - The second point
      p3 - The third point
      Returns:
      true if the second point and the third point have practically the same distance from this point
